BB-21128: Product Kits In Order (#36510)

* BB-22759: [Backend] Order with kit line items on a create/edit page in backoffice (#36183)

- added kitItemLineItems to OrderLineItemType form
- added OrderProductKitItemLineItemCollectionType and OrderProductKitItemLineItemType form type for OrderLineItem::$kitItemLineItems
- added OrderProductKitItemLineItemFactory
- added OrderProductKitLineItemListener that adds rendered kitItemLineItems form collection to OrderEvent data
- added order-product-kit-line-item-component js component to handle kitItemLineItems collection in order entry point response

* BB-22756: [Backend] Update backoffice API for OrderProductKitItemLineItem (#36190)

- added OrderProductKitItemLineItem config to the backoffice API;
- added documentation;
- added UpdateOrderProductKitItemLineItemProduct API processor which sets a product for OrderProductKitItemLineItem by provided product SKU;
- added AddKitItemLineItemToLineItem API processor which adds OrderProductKitItemLineItem to the OrderLineItem;
- used UpdatePriceByValueAndCurrency API processor to update price of OrderProductKitItemLineItem;
updated AddAssociatedOrderToUpdateTotals API processor in order to add an order of the created OrderProductKitItemLineItem to the list of orders which totals need to be recalculated

* BB-22758: [Backend] Order view page in backoffice (#36234)

- added "kit_configuration" template with following data: kit item name, kit item product, quantity, unit, price;
- used "kit_configuration" template in Product column of "order-line-items-grid" datagrid

* BB-22761: [Backend] Order with kit line items on a view page on storefront (#36235)

- added "frontendKitConfiguration" template with following data: kit item name, kit item product, quantity, unit, price;
- used "frontendKitConfiguration" template in "kitConfiguration" column of "order-line-items-grid-frontend" datagrid;
- added "kitConfiguration" column to the "order-line-items-grid-frontend" datagrid

* BB-22757: [Backend] Update storefront API for OrderProductKitItemLineItem (#36224)

- added API storefront orderkititemlineitems resource config;
- added documentation;
- added checksum generation;
- added FillOrderProductKitItemLineItemPrice and RememberOrderProductKitItemLineItemPrice to store and validate submitted price of OrderProductKitItemLineItem;
- added DisableOrderProductKitItemLineItemCreation to disable create action for OrderProductKitItemLineItem;
- added OrderProductKitItemLineItemAccessRule to deny access OrderProductKitItemLineItem that belongs to not accessible OrderLineItem;
- added guest access providers

* BB-22762: [Backend] Re-order with kits line items (#36252)

- added ProductKitItemLineItemConverter that converts instance of ProductKitItemLineItemInterface to the CheckoutProductKitItemLineItem;
used ProductKitItemLineItemConverter in the OrderLineItemConverter and ShoppingListLineItemConverter;
- added validation checks through validator to the OrderLineItemConverter instead of previous self-validation logic;
- added "order_line_item_to_checkout_line_item_convert" validation group and used it in the OrderLineItemConverter;
- added validation rules for checkout line item

* BB-22826: Backend] Fix mapping form error property path to the included data path (#36287)

- added recursively find proper field with error and fix it error path;
- updated validation of relationships format of the included entities

* BB-22914: [Backend] Remove duplicating of line item checksum generation mechanism (#36332)

- moved LineItemChecksumGeneratorInterface, CompositeLineItemChecksumGenerator, HashingLineItemChecksumGenerator and ProductKitLineItemChecksumGenerator from ShoppingListBundle to ProductBundle;
- removed LineItemChecksumGeneratorInterface, CompositeLineItemChecksumGenerator, HashingLineItemChecksumGenerator and ProductKitLineItemChecksumGenerator from OrderBundle;
- moved tests to the ProductBundle;
- updated related classes

* BB-22763: [Backend] Update email templates for use with product kits (#36325)

- updated LineItemsExtension in order to collect product kit configuration for order_confirmation_email template;
- updated order_confirmation_email template in order to show product kit configuration;
- updated PricingDataProcessor in order to skip getting prices for product kits

* BB-22779: [Backend] Prices for product kit line items in order (#36366)

- removed TierPriceEventListener, added OrderLineItemTierPricesEventListener instead to provide tier prices for product kit line items
- added price field to OrderProductKitItemLineItemType
- added checksum data to OrderProductKitLineItemListener to keep line item checksum up-to-date with its configuration
- fixed productUnitCode might be empty in ProductKitLineItemChecksumGenerator
- decomposed ProductKitLineItemPriceCriteriaFactory into ProductKitLineItemPriceCriteriaBuilderFactory
- added OrderProductPriceProvider to provide prices for all products present in an order
- added ProductLineItemProductPriceProvider to calculate tier prices for product kit line item
- removed unnecessary CollectionType parent from the OrderProductKitItemLineItemCollectionType
- added kit-item-line-item-view JS component
- updated line-item-product-prices-view to take into account checksum when searching for tier prices

* BB-22938: [Backend] Product kit line item price in API (#36421)

* BB-22938: [Backend] Product kit line item price in API
- made use of ProductLineItemPriceProvider in FillOrderLineItemPrice and FillOrderProductKitItemLineItemPrice
- removed ComputeLineItemPrice, added ComputeShoppingListLineItemPrice and ComputeShoppingListProductKitItemLineItemPrice instead
- made use of ProductLineItemPriceProvider in PriceMatcher
- updated OrderTaxesListener to remove PriceMatcher as prices are already filled at this point by \Oro\Bundle\OrderBundle\Form\Type\EventListener\SubtotalSubscriber
- removed unused controller actions \Oro\Bundle\PricingBundle\Controller\Frontend\AjaxProductPriceController::getMatchingPriceAction and \Oro\Bundle\PricingBundle\Controller\AjaxProductPriceController::getMatchingPriceAction
- removed unused MatchingPriceProvider
- removed unused MatchingPriceEventListener
- updated functional tests
- fixed OrderProductKitItemLineItemCollectionType does not exclude empty kit items for new order line items

* BB-22965: Update design of order view pages (#36451)

* BB-22965: Update design of order view pages
- add import to backoffice asset.yml
- add product styles for backoffice

* BB-22826: [Backend] Fix mapping form error property path to the included data path (#36449)

- updated form error mapping in case of not found form field

* BB-22760: [Backend] Order with kit line items submit in backoffice (#36387)

- updated validation constraints for OrderLineItem and OrderProductKitItemLineItem entities
- added order_create and order_update validation groups to OrderController
- added minimumQuantity, maximumQuantity, unitPrecision, productId, kitItemId fields to OrderProductKitItemLineItem
- renamed OrderProductKitItemLineItem::$kitItemOptional to $optional
- updated api configs, api docs, api tests with new fields
- updated installer and migrations
- added OrderLineItemChecksumListener for OrderLineItemType to set OrderLineItem::$checksum on submit
- added OrderLineItemProductListener to update kitItemLineItems field options on submit in OrderLineItemType
- added OrderProductKitItemLineItemCollectionRemovingListener to clear kitItemLineItems collection from empty optional elements
- added OrderProductKitItemLineItemDefaultDataListener to set default data in OrderProductKitItemLineItemType form
- added OrderProductKitItemLineItemExistingCollectionListener to update required option and add ghost elements for already existing kit item line items
- added OrderProductKitItemLineItemGhostOptionListener to add a ghost option product to OrderProductKitItemLineItemType to avoid form error for already existing and invalid kit item line items
- added OrderProductKitLineItemChecksumGenerator to take into account productId, kitItemId and price fields of kit item line items
- updated OrderProductPriceProvider to take into account products explicitly specified in kit item line items
- updated ProductLineItemProductPriceProvider to make it possible to work with kit item line items that do not have a kit item or product
- updated ShippingKitItemLineItem to make it work with kit item line items without product unit
- added EntityStateChecker for checking if an entity is new or changed
- added AdaptivelyValidCollection constraint and validator to give an ability to validate entities collection with different validation groups depending on the status of each entity
- added OrderKitItemLineItemProductAllowed constraint and validator for checking if a product is allowed for use in kit item line item
- added OrderKitItemLineItemProductUnitAllowed constraint and validator for checking if a product unit is allowed for use in kit item line item
- added oro_order.product_kit.checker.product_kit_item_product_availability_checker for checking if a kit item product is allowed for use in an order
- added oro_order.product_kit.provider.product_kit_item_products to get array of kit item products allowed for use in an order

* BB-22765: [Backend] Behat tests for storefront (#36380)

- added HasSupportedInventoryStatus validation constraint in order to check if product has supported inventory status;
- used HasSupportedInventoryStatus for checkout line item product validation;
- updated behats with kit item line items data in order view page and order confirmation emails;
- added the behat test to check Re-Order existing Orders with Product Kits

* BB-21128: Product Kits In Order

- reverted removing of required tests
- removed obsolete code

* BB-22966: [Frontend] Update design of order edit page with product kits (#36471)

- refactoring and review kit-item-line-item-view.js
- add matched price kit-item-line-item-product-prices-view.js
- refactoring markup and styles

* BB-22768: [Backend] Changelog & documentation (#36497)

- moved ProductKitAvailabilityChecker, ProductKitItemAvailabilityChecker, ProductKitItemProductAvailabilityChecker to ProductBundle
- moved ProductKitItemsProvider, ProductKitItemProductsProvider to ProductBundle
- moved OrderKitItemLineItemProductAllowed to ProductKitItemLineItemProductAvailable in ProductBundle
- moved OrderKitItemLineItemProductUnitAllowed to ProductKitItemLineItemProductUnitAvailable in ProductBundle
- made use of ProductKitItemLineItemProductAvailable and ProductKitItemLineItemProductUnitAvailable in validation configs of ShoppingListBundle and CheckoutBundle
- updated changelog for platform and commerce packages

* BB-22766: [Backend] XSS tests (#36509)

- updated fixtures with an order kit line item

* BB-22764: [Backend] Behat tests for back-office (#36584)

- added behat tests
- renamed label Matched Price to List Price
- fixed missing unit is shown as translation key
- added ProductUnitPrecisionAwareInterface, made use of it in OrderProductKitItemLineItem
- added ProductKitItemLineItemQuantityUnitPrecision constraint and validator
- fixed broken prices when line items share same product kit but kit item line items have overridden prices
- updated ProductKitItemLineItemProductAvailable and ProductKitItemLineItemProductUnitAvailable to allow to specify fields in ifChanged option

* BB-23091: [Backend] Unify relations to ProductUnit across OrderProductKitItemLineItem and CheckoutProductKitItemLineItem (#36621)

- renamed CheckoutProductKitItemLineItem::$unit to $productUnit
- renamed OrderProductKitItemLineItem::$unit to $productUnit
- renamed OrderProductKitItemLineItem::$unitCode to $productUnitCode
- renamed OrderProductKitItemLineItem::$unitPrecision to $productUnitPrecision
- renamed ProductUnitPrecisionAwareInterface::getUnitPrecision to getProductUnitPrecision
- updated migrations, translations, validation constraints
- updated unit, functional, behat tests

* BB-23094: [Backend] Resolve the conflicts with GeneralChecksumGenerat… (#36632)

- moved checksum generators out of the product kit namespace to LineItemChecksumGenerator
- added GeneralLineItemChecksumGenerator to ProductBundle
- updated changelog

* BB-23099: Select product grid doesn't contain product kits (#36672)

- added the ability to specify product type via parameters in products-select-grid
- added grid_parameters option to product field in OrderLineItemType

* BB-21128: Product Kits In Order
- moved the product kit behat tests to the regression builds
Merge remote-tracking branch 'remotes/dev/master'

issue.title: Create console command to view global config
issue.body:
Currently an administrator can update the Oro config via the CLI using `oro:config:update`

This adds `oro:config:view` which enables viewing the current config

comment.body:
@mbessolov 

1. Pretty printing is simple enough and I have (uncommitted) code to handle array|object|bool configs
2. Seems possible using `oro_config.provider.system_configuration.form_provider` (`Oro\Bundle\ConfigBundle\Provider\SystemConfigurationFormProvider`) to work out how the field is configured, although TBH I'm not sure if this is desired behaviour. The `oro:config:update` command is completely unaware of the system config UI, and thus, for example, will dump a plain text value into a field which is meant to be encrypted, so for me it makes sense for this mirror command to behave in a similarly unaware fashion. A user who has access to the CLI likely has access to the DB anyway, so this is just (meant to be) a convenient way of grabbing the value without needing to write an SQL query or manually decode the value. Thoughts?
3. I haven't looked at this yet but can do so

BAP-22231: Fixed date issues after PHP patch version update  (#36391)

- commented the first date of week expectation for zh_CN as it depends on Intl version
- fixed date formatting to be consistent across PHP versions with different Intl version
BAP-22015: Layout expressions does not support double quote wrapping (#36381) (#36409)

BB-22393: Add ACL support for product fields (#36262)

* BB-22393: Add ACL support for product fields (#35150)

* The behaviour of checking access to fields has been fixed, now fields without permissions return a positive result when checked.
* Changed the behaviour of datagrid that displays products. Now all columns, filters and sorters are removed from the datagrid if there are no permissions.
* The product view page has been changed. All fields without accesses are not displayed on the product view page and if all fields in a group are missing, the group will also be deleted.
* The product edit page has been changed. All fields without accesses will be deleted or if the 'show_restriction' parameter is available, they will be blocked without the right to modify them. The error output and logging have also been changed. Now all field errors are displayed as a single messag error with a list of fields. Errors are logged individually for each field.

BB-22807: Make RFQ and Quote related entities extendable
- fixed error in behat form filling for dates
- behats fixes

pull_request.title: Support lazy command definition in CronDefinitionsLoadCommand
pull_request.body:
When defining cron commands to be [lazy](https://symfony.com/doc/5.4/console/commands_as_services.html#console-command-service-lazy-loading), they will be loaded as instances of [LazyCommand](https://github.com/symfony/console/blob/v5.4.28/Command/LazyCommand.php) and thus fail the `$command instanceof CronCommandScheduleDefinitionInterface` check.

Compare SymfonyConsole [Application::doRun](https://github.com/symfony/console/blob/6.3/Application.php#L315-L317).

issue.title: Create console command to view global config
issue.body:
Currently an administrator can update the Oro config via the CLI using `oro:config:update`

This adds `oro:config:view` which enables viewing the current config

comment.body:
Hi @carbsrule

Thank you for your contribution, it could be quite useful for some developers/adminstrators.

In order for this to be accepted though, it needs some additional changes:

1. Properly support output of different data types. If some value cannot be pretty-printed, the command should indicate it.
2. It should properly handle (i.e. not show) sensitive values - if the value is masked in the system configuration UI, it should be masked in this command's output as well.
3. Tests - please look at how other commands are tested. Most likely we will need a functional test and a unit test to properly cover the (updated version of) this command.

Thank you

* The product view page has been changed. All fields without accesses are not displayed on the product view page and if all fields in a group are missing, the group will also be deleted.
* The product edit page has been changed. All fields without accesses will be deleted or if the 'show_restriction' parameter is available, they will be blocked without the right to modify them. The error output and logging have also been changed. Now all field errors are displayed as a single messag error with a list of fields. Errors are logged individually for each field.
